PackageOracle.name: DA_CUSTOMER
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CUSTOMER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.48.933105000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,first_contact_dt IN DATE
,first_fulfillment IN VARCHAR2
,first_payment IN VARCHAR2
,external_customer_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,first_contact_dt IN DATE
,first_fulfillment IN VARCHAR2
,first_payment IN VARCHAR2
,external_customer_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_id IN NUMBER
,first_contact_dt IN DATE
,first_fulfillment IN VARCHAR2
,first_payment IN VARCHAR2
,external_customer_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_customer;

body.name: DA_CUSTOMER
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CUSTOMER
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.48.945166000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,first_contact_dt IN DATE
,first_fulfillment IN VARCHAR2
,first_payment IN VARCHAR2
,external_customer_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer.add(fx), parms=' || first_contact_dt || '|' || first_fulfillment || '|' || first_payment || '|' || external_customer_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer a
(
a.customer_id
,a.first_contact_dt
,a.first_fulfillment
,a.first_payment
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.external_customer_id
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_customer_id.NEXTVAL
,add.first_contact_dt
,add.first_fulfillment
,add.first_payment
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.external_customer_id
) RETURNING a.customer_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,first_contact_dt IN DATE
,first_fulfillment IN VARCHAR2
,first_payment IN VARCHAR2
,external_customer_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer.add, parms=' || first_contact_dt || '|' || first_fulfillment || '|' || first_payment || '|' || external_customer_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer a
(
a.customer_id
,a.first_contact_dt
,a.first_fulfillment
,a.first_payment
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.external_customer_id
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_customer_id.NEXTVAL
,add.first_contact_dt
,add.first_fulfillment
,add.first_payment
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.external_customer_id
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_id IN NUMBER
,first_contact_dt IN DATE
,first_fulfillment IN VARCHAR2
,first_payment IN VARCHAR2
,external_customer_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer.add, parms=' || customer_id || '|' || first_contact_dt || '|' || first_fulfillment || '|' || first_payment || '|' || external_customer_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_customer a
(
a.customer_id
,a.first_contact_dt
,a.first_fulfillment
,a.first_payment
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
,a.external_customer_id
)
VALUES
(
add.customer_id
,add.first_contact_dt
,add.first_fulfillment
,add.first_payment
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
,add.external_customer_id
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,customer_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_customer.del, parms=' || customer_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_customer a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.customer_id = del.customer_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_customer.del');

END del;

END da_customer;
